segments.text: That sink is a nightmare, faucet blasting water nonstop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's polishing away, blind to the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing, cabinets doomed to swell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep in it, still no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids on the other side, boy teetering on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar like it's a treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But one tilt and he'll tumble with cookies flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's all eager, palm up for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief could cause a real accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's calm, highlighting the indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unfold without intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby might shatter if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
